maqras.text: Nandao wo meiyou wei ni [mu sheng] er kaita ni de xinxiong,
wei ni xie xia ya zai ni bei shang de zhongdan,
bing tigao ni de shengyu ma?
Jian nan zhihou bi you rongyi,
jian nan zhihou bi you rongyi.
Dang ni jieshu gongzuo shi, ni dang qilai chongbai an la [ru libai],
ni dang zhuanxin qiqiu ni de zhu.
Yi wuhuaguo he ganlan guo fashi,
yi xinai shan fashi,
yi zhe zuo ping'an di chengshi [mai jia] fashi,
wo que yi chuangzao ren yu zui wanmei de xingtai zhong,
ranhou, wo you ba ta bian jiang cheng zui beijian de,
Wei xinyang bing xingshan zhe liwai, tamen [xinyang bing xingshan zhe] jiang huode yongheng de baochou [leyuan].
Cihou, shenme [shei] shi ni [bu xinyang zhe] fouren shenpan ri ne?
Nandao an la bushi zui hao de shenpan zhe ma?
Ni dang feng ni de zaowuzhu de zun ming xuandu,
ta yong xiekuai chuangzao ren.
Ni dang xuandu, ni de zhu shi zui hao shi de,
ta jiao ren yong bi xiezi [di yige hui xiezi de ren shi yi de lisi shengren],
ta jiao ren zhidao ren suo bu zhidao de [zhu][1-5 jie xi “gulanjing” zhong zuizao jiang shi de jing wen].
Bu, ren que shi beini de,
yinwei ta renwei ta shi ziman wu qiu de.
Wanwu [zuizhong] dou jiang gui dao ni de zhu nali qu.
Ni [mu sheng] kanjian zuzhi wo de puren [mu sheng] libai di nage ren [ru ai bu•jia he lei] ma?
Ni gaosu wo ba! Ta zunxing zhengdao [yisilan jiao] ma?
Ta quan ren jingwei ma?
Ni gaosu wo ba! Ta [ru ai bu•jia he lei] fouren zhenli [“gulanjing”] bing beili ma?
Nandao ta bu zhidao an la neng kanjian [ta suo zuo de yiqie] ma?
Bu, jiaru ta [ru ai bu•jia he lei] bu tingzhi, wo bi zhua zhu ta de e fa——
nage shuohuang zhe he fanzui zhe de e fa.
[Na shi] rang ta qu hu qiu ta de tongban ba!
Wo jiang zhaohuan huo yu de jingwei zhe [tianshi].
Bu, ni [mu sheng] buyao fucong ta [ru ai bu•jia he lei], ni dang [libai] koutou, ni dang jiejin an la. Koutou chu
wo que yi zai gaogui zhi ye [zhu][huo qian dingzhi ye huo gai de'er ye] jiang shi ta [“gulanjing”].
Ni zen neng zhidao gaogui zhi ye shi shenme?
Gaogui zhi ye bi yiqian ge yue [ji 83 nian ling 4 ge yue] hai youyue [ci ye chongbai an la sheng yu pingshi 1000 ge yue de chongbai].
Tianshimen he jingshen [ji bu li lei tianshi] feng ta de zhu [an la] de mingling daizhe dui yiqie shiwu de panjue zai nage yeli jiang shi.
Nage ye shi ping'an di, zhidao liming xianxian.
You jing ren he bai ouxiang zhe zhong de bu xinyang zhe meiyou fangqi [tamen yuan you de xinyang], zhidao mingzheng jianglin tamen.
[Nage mingzheng shi] an la de yi wei shizhe [mu sheng] xuandu chunzhen de jingdian [“gulanjing”],
qizhong you [cong an la jiang shi de] zhengque de faling.
Shou ci jingdian zhe [you jing ren], zhidao mingzheng [mu sheng he “gulanjing”] jianglin tamen hou cai yijian fenqi.
Tamen yi fengming zhi neng chongbai an la, zhi neng qiancheng jingyi chongbai du yi de an la, bing jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, zhe cai shi zhengjiao [yisilan jiao].
You jing ren he bai ouxiang zhe zhong de bu xinyang zhe bi ru huo yu, yong ju qizhong. Zhexie ren que shi [an la de] chuangzao wu zhong zui liedeng de.
Xinyang bing xingshan de renmen, zhexie ren que shi [an la de] chuangzao wu zhong zui youxiu de,
tamen zai tamen de zhu nali de baochou shi:[Zhu zai] zhu heliuguo de leyuan, yong ju qizhong. An la xiyue tamen, tamen jing'ai an la. Zhe shi wei weiju ta de zhu de ren yubei de.
Dang dadi qianglie zhendong [zhu],
dang dadi pao chu qi zhongdan shi,
ren jiang shuo:“Dadi zenme la?”
Zai na ri, dadi jiang baogao ziji de xiaoxi [da dishang ceng fasheng de shan e],
yinwei ni de zhu yi qishi ta.
Zai na ri, renlei jiang fen pi chuxian, yibian tamen kanjian ziji de xingwei [de baochou].
Shei zuole yige yuanzi zhi zhong de shanshi [zhu], shei jiang jian qi shan bao;
shei zuole yi ge yuanzi zhi zhong de e shi, shei jiang jian qi e bao.
Yi benchi er chuanxi de zhanma,
ti fa huohua,
liming shi tuxi,
juan qi mantian huichen,
xunsu gong ru dizhen de zhanma fashi,
ren [bu xinyang zhe] dui ziji de zhu zong shi wang'enfuyi de.
Ta [de xingwei] que shi jianzheng ci shi [wang'enfuyi] de.
Ta dique feichang tan ai caifu.
